Class Summary VersionControl_Hg_CommandProxy
Instantiates the Mercurial command and passes an instance of VersionControl_Hg into the constructor of each command.

Class Summary VersionControl_Hg_Command_Archive
Exports repository to a (optionally compressed) archive file.
Exports repository to a (optionally compressed) archive file.
Usage:
$hg->archive('tip')->to('/home/myself/releases/')->with('tgz')->run();

Class Summary VersionControl_Hg_Command_Status
Implements the status command.
Implements the status command.
The codes used to show the status of files are: M = modified A = added R = removed C = clean ! = missing (deleted by non-hg command, but still tracked) ? = not tracked I = ignored
PHP version 5

The Mercurial repository
The Mercurial repository
Usage: All calls are proxied from Hg
